## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                               | Type                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `placement` | `placement`  | Used to specify the placement of the tabs | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `undefined` |
| `textColor` | `text-color` | Tab text color                            | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
